com.dyuproject.protostuff.json
Class ReflectionNumericJSON

java.lang.Object
  com.dyuproject.protostuff.json.ProtobufJSON
      com.dyuproject.protostuff.json.ReflectionJSON
          com.dyuproject.protostuff.json.ReflectionNumericJSON

public class ReflectionNumericJSON
extends ReflectionJSON

Same as ReflectionJSON but simply writes the message's field number instead of field name.

Author:
David Yu
Date created:
Oct 2, 2009
